page.title: 18RECREATION IN THE AREA
page.content: People in the area relax and find enjoyment in their spare time in many ways.Some of these activities take place in the district but for others they have to go further afield to find the required facilities.Recreational activities recorded in the area include walking,cycling,horse riding, golf,bowls,cricket,football,tennis, gardening,jogging,dancing,roller skating & boating on the canal.Other less physical forms of relaxation noted include the playing of musical instruments,embroidery,singing,flower arranging,snooker,billiads,darts & dominoes.Many older people find their recreation in watching or helping to organise sport for others.Many people in the area have to travel further afield if they wish to do swimming, sailing,weight lifting,squash,hockey, rugby,climbing & badminton.
